addr: 10880 Wilshire Blvd. Suite #122. Los Angeles, CA 90024
title: Free Introduction to Real Estate Class - Westwood
desc: Are you interested in starting a new career in real estate and joining an experienced brokerage? CA Realty Training partnered with Keller Williams can help you do just that with amazing trainers that have worked in the real estate industry for years! This free introductory training session will give you an overview to the real estate industry and what requirements are necessary for you to take the license exam with the California Bureau of Real Estate. Aside from this, we will also train you how to create a rewarding career that will allow you to expand into residential, commercial or luxury real estate industries. This training session is a perfect introduction into what real estate is all about! If you enjoy the free training session and would like to continue, then we do offer a complete program that will extend for three months and will go more in-depth into all the various topics of real estate to learn the ins and outs of the business! Call or visit our website for more information! 888-317-8740 CARealtyTraining.com
